Marco Rubio

@marcorubio
[url=https://twitter.com/marcorubio][/url]


Today at 5:25pm EST I & my colleagues will be moving to pass the #HongKong Human Rights & Democracy Act in the U.S. Senate.

If no Senator objects it will pass & head over to the U.S. House & then hopefully swiftly to the President
